Pawn - Enum in View
 
payday() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: The payday gui popup window is called, the player receives 3500$ as a salary, he pays his bills and loan interest, he can pay off his loans or part of them and all his cards are removed.

Player - Class in Model
Player class (implements PlayerADT) describes the characteristics of a player (name, cards he has collected, money, loans, bills) and provides modification methods
Player(String, int) - Constructor for class Model.Player
constructor: Constructs a new Player with the given parameter name and initial money
postcondition: Creates and initializes a player with the given name and initial money.Also initializes some variables (for example initialize variables that give us information if a player won the game or if it is his turn to play)
PlayerADT - Interface in Model
The interface of a Player with the declaration of the methods that set, get and modify the attributes of the Player
PlayerAndTransactionsTest - Class in JUnitTests
 
PlayerAndTransactionsTest() - Constructor for class JUnitTests.PlayerAndTransactionsTest
 
playerPaysBank(Player, int) - Static method in class Model.BankTransactions
transformer: the player will pay the bank an amount of money
Precondition: The player must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
Postcondition: The bank has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the player
playerPaysJackpot(Player, int) - Method in class Model.Jackpot
transformer: the player will pay the jackpot an amount of money
Precondition: The player must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
Postcondition: The jackpot has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the player
playerPaysPlayer(Player, Player, int) - Static method in class Model.BankTransactions
transformer: the player will pay the other player an amount of money
Precondition: The players must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
Postcondition: The Player has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the other player
Point - Class in Model
A class that holds x,y coordinates
Point(int, int) - Constructor for class Model.Point
constructor: Constructs a new Point with the given coordinates
postcondition: Creates and initializes a Point with the given x,y coordinates.
